markdownRemark.html:
Lv 2. JadenCase 문자열 만들기

문제

풀이

function solution(s) {
    let answer = '';
    s=s.toLowerCase()
    let arr= s.split(" ");
    for(let i=0; i<arr.length;i++){
        let temp="";
        for(let j=0; j<arr[i].length;j++){
            if(j==0){
                temp+=arr[i][0].toUpperCase();
            }else{
                temp+=arr[i][j];
            }
        }
        if(i<arr.length-1)
            answer+=temp+" "
        else
            answer+=temp
    }
    return answer
}
